instruction: Generate a creative story involving the following characters.
output: Once upon a time, there was a teacher, an engineer, and a farmer who were the best of friends. One day, the farmer had an idea to build a machine that could help him with his daily chores. So, the teacher and the engineer team up and construct a complicated machine that helps the farmer in his work. From that day forward, the three of them were always together, using their knowledge and skills to make the world a better place.
